post.text: Michelle Obama is on the trail for Hillary today in Virginia. Catch it live here.

comment.author: Wulfgar
comment.text: The Obama's have done so much for our country and Hillary will build on it

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Build on taking our God away, I find this video appalling... I just saw it today and I could not believe it. They cannot even say under God? Really? https://www.facebook.com/mcallout/videos/606146669543930/
